name: wallbreaker
description: Wallbreaker is a headless e-commerce store template built on [Fourthwall](https://fourthwall.com/), [Cloudflare Workers](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/) and [Astro](https://astro.build/). It's designed to work on the free tier plan for both platform and ingest all webhooks availble from Fourthwall using a [Hono](https://hono.dev/) router.
